reviewText: Very interesting documentary with important comments about how poorly the British Government actually handled the situation from start to the end of the occupation.

I just saw one episode of "Channel Islands at War" narrated by John Nettles on our local PBS station and I am totally riveted now. This is a must-add to any dvd library once it becomes available. Thank you John Nettles, for making this available.

Would love to view and review this DVD but its cost is absolutely prohibitive plus I'm not sure I could even watch it on my Region I DVD player.
That being said....I'm sure it is excellent so, by golly, I'll rate it Five Stars!
Meanwhile, I am thoroughly enjoying reading a very good book on the subject,

http://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B00KDMLYHS/ref=wms_ohs_product?ie=UTF8&psc=1
THE CHANNEL ISLANDS AT WAR by Robert Bard.
